code: import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState,useCallback}from"react";import"./Weather.css";import search_icon from"../assets/search.png";import clear_icon from"../assets/clear.png";import cloud_icon from"../assets/wind.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Weather=()=>{const inputRef=useRef();const[weatherData,setWeatherData]=useState(false);const search=useCallback(async city=>{const
